name: Keketso “Cake” Moteetee
bio: Whipping up imaginative concepts and executing them with precision. Keketso specialises in storytelling and preproduction—guiding ideas from spark to screen with care and creativity.

name: Thivhusiwi “Tea” Mamaila
bio: A master of production and post. With 9 years of experience, Thivhu crafts visuals that captivate—turning your vision into polished, immersive media magic.
